description: Canonical registry of ALL behavior parameters. This is the SINGLE SOURCE OF TRUTH. All specs, playbook configs, seed scripts, and runtime code MUST reference parameter IDs from this file.

parameters.name: Warmth Level
parameters.definition: Overall warmth and friendliness in agent tone
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent is warm, friendly, and approachable
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent is neutral or distant in tone

parameters.name: Empathy Expression Rate
parameters.definition: Frequency of empathetic statements, acknowledgments, and emotional validation
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent frequently expresses empathy and validates emotions
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent maintains neutral, task-focused communication

parameters.name: Personalization Level
parameters.definition: How much agent references caller-specific information and history
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent frequently references caller's history, preferences, and context
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent uses generic, non-personalized responses

parameters.name: Formality Level
parameters.definition: Degree of formal vs casual language in agent responses
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent uses formal, professional language
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent uses casual, conversational language

parameters.name: Directness Level
parameters.definition: How direct vs indirect the agent is in communication
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent is direct and to-the-point
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent is indirect and nuanced

parameters.name: Response Length
parameters.definition: Average response length normalized to 0-1 scale
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent gives longer, more detailed responses
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent gives brief, concise responses

parameters.name: Role Flexibility
parameters.definition: How often the agent switches between communication roles (teacher, peer, guide)
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent fluidly switches roles based on context
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent maintains a single consistent role

parameters.name: Communication Clarity
parameters.definition: How clear and unambiguous communication is
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent communicates with high clarity and precision
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent's communication is ambiguous or unclear

parameters.name: Question Asking Rate
parameters.definition: Ratio of questions to total utterances — measures questioning density within speech
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent asks many questions to engage caller
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent primarily provides information without questions

parameters.name: Question Frequency
parameters.definition: How often the agent asks conversational questions vs. providing statements, reflections, or observations — measures cadence across turns
parameters.interpretationHigh: Question-led conversation — nearly every turn includes a question
parameters.interpretationLow: Mostly statements and reflections — questions only when genuinely needed

parameters.name: Insight Sharing Frequency
parameters.definition: How often the agent shares interesting knowledge, facts, anecdotes, or connections during a call
parameters.interpretationHigh: Knowledge-rich — 3+ insights per call, actively shares interesting connections
parameters.interpretationLow: Pure listener — shares knowledge only if directly asked

parameters.name: Active Listening
parameters.definition: Frequency of active listening indicators (backchannels, reflections, summaries)
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent shows strong active listening through reflections and summaries
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent responds without acknowledging caller's specific points

parameters.name: Proactivity Level
parameters.definition: How proactively the agent offers information, suggestions, or guidance
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent proactively offers help and suggestions
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent waits for caller to ask or lead

parameters.name: Pace Matching
parameters.definition: How well the agent matches the caller's conversational pace and energy
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent closely matches caller's pace and energy
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent maintains own pace regardless of caller

parameters.name: Style Mirroring
parameters.definition: How much agent mirrors caller's communication style, vocabulary, and tone
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent closely mirrors caller's style
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent maintains own consistent style

parameters.name: Turn Length
parameters.definition: How long the agent speaks per turn relative to optimal voice conversation length
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent takes longer turns with more detail
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent keeps turns very short and punchy

parameters.name: Pause Tolerance
parameters.definition: How long the agent waits during silence before speaking
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent waits patiently during long pauses — lets caller think
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent fills silence quickly

parameters.name: Conversational Depth
parameters.definition: How deep vs surface-level the agent takes conversations
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent explores topics in depth with nuance and layers
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent keeps conversations light and surface-level

parameters.name: Experience Respect
parameters.definition: How much agent acknowledges and defers to caller's life experience and wisdom
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent deeply respects and references caller's life experience
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent treats caller as a peer without age/experience awareness

parameters.name: Intellectual Challenge
parameters.definition: How much agent pushes caller to think critically and explore ideas
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent actively challenges thinking with counterpoints and deeper questions
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent agrees and affirms without intellectual pushback

parameters.name: Patience Level
parameters.definition: How patient the agent is with slow responses, repetition, or confusion
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent is extremely patient — never rushes, always waits
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent moves on quickly if caller seems stuck

parameters.name: Memory Referencing
parameters.definition: How often agent references past conversations, shared history, and caller memories
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent frequently weaves in past conversations and shared context
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent treats each conversation as largely standalone

parameters.name: Story Invitation
parameters.definition: How often agent invites caller to share stories, anecdotes, and personal experiences
parameters.interpretationHigh: Agent actively invites stories and personal anecdotes
parameters.interpretationLow: Agent stays topic-focused without inviting personal narratives
